name: RADIANT RACER
description:
Gameplay

Radiant Racer is a racing game mixed with a roguelike.
Your goal in this version, where all the assets, music and code were made in 48h, is to kill all the enemies without dying.
You have Fuel, you regain fuel by racing trough the course, and you want to kill every enemy on the map.
In the concept you go to the boss battle when you clear the  stage, but for this version you just win when you kill them all.
You can also collect powerups to help you on your quest to KILL ALL THE EVIL AI...

Controls

Use A and D to turn
Use SPACEBAR to give gas
Use the cursor to AIM
Use left mouse button to shoot

Credits

Game made by 6 people:

  • 1 Game designer,
  • 2 Game developers,
  • 1 Artist,
  • 1 Musician,
  • 1 Supporter

Game sabotaged by one cat, f*ck you Jimmy stop walking on my keyboadaskbsvjzx

All assets, code, sound en music has been made in 48 hours!
